body_html: @zou3519 It looks like a floating point error. However, even I changed the tensor type to double, this error still exists. This number seems not be small enough to overflow in double. In addition, I checked Numpy and the same function in Numpy can get the correct number.
body_text: @zou3519 It looks like a floating point error. However, even I changed the tensor type to double, this error still exists. This number seems not be small enough to overflow in double. In addition, I checked Numpy and the same function in Numpy can get the correct number.
body: @zou3519 It looks like a floating point error. However, even I changed the tensor type to double, this error still exists. This number seems not be small enough to overflow in double. In addition, I checked Numpy and the same function in Numpy can get the correct number.
